author: davidlt
body:
See issue: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/21618

CVS history shows that it was copied from PhysicsTools/UtilAlgos (only
header part, not the C++ file). Then removed and again added back later
on. The commit message does not state why this was done. Only the
original copy in PhysicsTools/UtilAlgos received consumes migration.

The patch removed existing copy in PhysicsTools/UtilAlgos and moves it
to CommonTools/UtilAlgos as mentioned here:

https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/15248#issuecomment-348206364

Signed-off-by: David Abdurachmanov <David.Abdurachmanov@cern.ch>
title: Move InputTagDistributor to CommonTools/UtilAlgos
